name: VectorSize
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3z and will not work in earlier versions!
description: Returns the norm (length) of the provided vector.

params_body.name: Float:X
params_body.description: The vector's magnitude on the X axis.

params_body.name: Float:Y
params_body.description: The vector's magnitude on the Y axis.

params_body.name: Float:Z
params_body.description: The vector's magnitude on the Z axis.

return_values: The norm (length) of the provided vector as a float.
related_fn:
GetPlayerDistanceFromPoint: Get the distance between a player and a point.
 GetVehicleDistanceFromPoint: Get the distance between a vehicle and a point.
 floatsqroot: Calculate the square root of a floating point value.
